item.title: Ines add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "If the future is to remain open and free, we need people who can tolerate the unknown, who will not need the support of completely worked out systems or traditional blueprints from the past." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Ines add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "Sometimes I dislike women, I dislike us all, because of our capacity for not-thinking when it suits us; we choose not to think when we are reaching our for happiness." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Ines add a quote by Ivan Klíma
item.description: "It needs a lot of courage to admit to an action that one is ashamed of and knows to be wrong. One's reluctance to hurt someone else is just an excuse; in fact it is lack of courage." -- Ivan Klíma

item.title: Ines add a quote by Sena Jeter Naslund
item.description: "That's the way it is in life. You let go of what is beautiful and unique. You pursue something new and don't even know that the wind of your own running is a thief." -- Sena Jeter Naslund
